attributes.action: grant the Cherry Tree, Netherton, Wishaw a 24 hour License and also stipulate that Steak Baguettes be available at any given time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These baguettes may be available for delivery also.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
